name: LadyLuxeAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, open lady luxe affirmations”
”Alexa, ask lady luxe affirmations for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start lady luxe affirmations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lady luxe affirmations
des: Start your day with positive affirmations to manifest the life of your dreams. New Affirmations each day meant to get your mind prepared to win! You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
